sections.text: agnirnaH̍ pAtu kRuttikAH|̍ nakśhatraM̍ dEvamindriyam|̍ idamAsAM̍ ~Mvicakśhaṇam| havirAqsaM juhOtana|̍ | yasya BAnti# raśmayO yasya# kEtavaH|̍ yasyEmA viśvAq BuvanAni̍ sarvA̱| sa kRuttikABiraBi̍ sam~MvasAnaH|̍ agnirnO# dEvaH suvitE̍ dadhAtu|̍ | prajApatE̍ rOhiṇI vEtu̍ patnI̱| viśvarUpA̍ bRuhatI citraBAnuH|̍ 1 (10)

sA nO# yajñasya# suvitE dadhAtu|̍ yathAq jIvEma̍ śaradaH savIrAH|̍ | rOhiṇI dEvyudagAt̍ purastA̱t| viśvA# rUpAṇi# pratimOdamAnA|̍ prajApatiṃ̍ haviśhA# varddhayantI|̍ priyA dEvAnAq-mupayAtu̍ yajñam| | sOmO rAjA# mRugaśIra. śhEṇa Agann|̍ śivaM nakśhatraM̍ priyamasya̍ dhAma|̍ AqpyAyamAnO̍ bahuqdhA janEśhu|̍ rEtaH̍ prajAM ~MyajamAnE̍ dadhAtu| | 2 (10)

yat tE nakśhatraM̍ mRugaśIqra. śhamasti|̍ priyaṃ rAjan̍ priyatamaM̍ priyAṇA̱m| tasmai# tE sOma haviśhA# vidhEma| śanna# Edhi dvipadE śaM catuśhpadE|̍ | AqrdrayA# rudraH prathamAna̍ Eti| śrEśhThO# dEvAnAqM patiraGniyAnA̱m|̍ nakśhatramasya̍ haviśhA# vidhEma| mA naH̍ prajAṃ rIriśhan̍ mOta vIrAn| | hEtI rudrasya pariṇO̍ vRuṇaktu| AqrdrA nakśhatraM̍ juśhatAṃ havirnaH|̍ 3 (10)

pramu~jcamAnau̍ duritAni viśvA̱| apAqGaśaṃ# saM nudatAqmarAtim|̍ | punarnO̍ dEvyaditiH̍ spRuṇOtu| punarvasU̍ naH punarEtA̱M ~Myajñam| punarnO̍ dEvA aBiyantu̍ sarvE̱| punaH̍ punarvO haviśhA# yajAmaH| | EvA na dEvyaditiranarvA|̍ viśvasya̍ BartrI jagataH̍ pratiśhThA| punarvasU̍ haviśhA# varddhayantI|̍ priyaM dEvAnAq-mapyEtu̍ pAthaH|̍ | 4 (10)

bRuhaspatiH̍ prathamaM jAyamAnaH|̍ tiśhyaM̍ nakśhatramaBi̍ saMbaBUva|̍ śrEśhThO# dEvAnAqM pRutanAsu̍ jiśhṇuH| diśO&nu sarvAq aBayannO̍ astu| | tiśhyaH̍ purastAduta̍ maddhyatO̍ naH|̍ bRuhaspati# rnaH paripAtu̍ paścAt| bAdhEtAqn̍ dvEśhO aBayaM̍ kRuṇutAm| suvIryasya̍ patayaH̍ syAma| | idaṃ sarpEByO# havirastu̍ juśhTa̱m| AqśrEśhA yEśhA-manuyanti̍ cEtaH|̍ 5 (10)

yE antarikśhaM̍ pRuthivIM kśhiyanti|̍ tEnaH̍ sarpAsO havamAgamiśhThAH|̍ | yE rOcanE̍ sUryasyApi# sarpAH| yE divaM̍ dEvImanu# sa~jcaranti|̍ yEśhAmAśrEśhA̍ anuyanti̍ kAma̱m| tEByaH̍ sarpEByO madhumajjuhOmi|̍ | upahUtAH̍ pitarO yE maGAsu|̍ manOjavasaH̍ sukRutaH̍ sukRutyAH| tE nO nakśhatrE̍ havamAgamiśhThAH|̍ svadhABi# ryajñaM prayataM̍ juśhantAm| | 6 (10)

yE agnidagdhA̍ yE&nagni-dagdhAH|̍ yE&muM̍ ~MlOkaM pitaraH̍ kśhiyanti|̍ yAṅśca# vidmayAṃ u# ca na pravidma|̍ maGAsu# yajñaṃ sukRutaM̍ juśhantAm| | gavAqM patiH PalgunInAmasi̍ tvam| tadaryaman̍ varuṇa mitra cAru|̍ taM tvA# vayaṃ sanitAraṃ̍# sanInAm| jIvA jIvantamupa̍ sam~MviśEma|̍ | yEnEmA viśvAq BuvanAni̍ sa~jjitA|̍ yasya# dEvA anu̍ sam~Myanti cEtaH|̍ 7 (10)

aryamA rAjAq&jarastuviśhmAn|̍ PalgunInA-mRuśhaBO̍ rOravIti|̍ | śrEśhThO# dEvAnA̱M BagavO BagAsi| tattvA# viduH PalgunIstasya̍# vittAt| asmaByaM̍ kśhatramajaraṃ# suvIrya̱m| gOmadaśva-vadupa-sannu̍dEha|̍ | BagO# ha dAqtA Baga it pradAqtA|̍ BagO# dEvIH PalgunIrAvi̍vEśa|̍ BagasyEttaM prasavaM̍ gamEma|̍ yatra# dEvaiH sadhamAda̍M̍ madEma| | 8 (10)

AyAtu̍ dEvaH savitOpa̍yAtu|̍ hiraṇyayEna̍ suvRutAq rathEna|̍ vahanq. hastaṃ# suBagaM̍ vidmanApasam|̍ prayacCantaM̍ papuriM̍ puṇyamacCa|̍ | hastaH prayacCa̍ tvamRutaM ~MvasIyaH|̍ dakśhiṇEna̍ pratigRuBṇIma̍ Enat| dAqtAramadya̍ savitA̍ vidEya|̍ yO nO hastAya̍ prasuvAti# yajñam| | tvaśhTAq nakśhatramaByE̍ti̍ citrAm| suBaṃ sasaM̍ ~Myuvatiṃ rOcamAnAm|̍ 9 (10)

nivEśaya-nnamRutAqn̍ martyAṅśca|̍ rUpAṇi# piṃqśan BuvanAni̍ viśvA̱| | tannastvaśhTAq tadu# citrA vicaśhTAm|̍ tannakśhatraM̍ BUridA astu̍ mahya̱m| tannaH̍ prajAM ~MvIravatIṃ̍ sanOtu| gOBirnO̍ aśvaiH samanaktu̍ yajñam| | vAqyurnakśhatra-maByE̍ti̍ niśhTyA̱m| tigmaśRu~ggO̍ vRuśhaBO rOruvAṇaH|̍ samIrayan BuvanA̍ mAtariśvA̱| apa dvEśhAṃsi̍ nudatAqmarAtIH|̍ | 10 (10)

tannO# vAqyastadu niśhTyA# śRuṇOtu| tannakśhatraM̍ BUridA astu̍ mahya̱m| tannO# dEvAsO anu# jAnantu kAma̱m| yathAq tarEma̍ duritAni viśvA̱| | dUramasmacCatravO̍ yantu BItAH| tadindrAqgnI̍ kRuṇutAqM̍ tad viśAKE|̍ tannO# dEvA anumadantu̍ yajñam| paścAt purastAq-daBayannO̍ astu| | nakśhatrAṇAq-madhi̍patnI̍ viśAKE|̍ śrEśhThAvindrAqgnI̍ Buvanasya̍ gOpau| 11 (10)

viśhUcaH̍ śatrU-napabAdha̍mAnau|̍ apa kśhudhaM̍ nudatAqmarAtim|̍ | pUrṇA paścAduta pUrṇA purastA̱t| unmaddhyataH̍ pau̱rṇamAqsI jigAya|̍ tasyA̱M dEvA adhi# sam~MvasantaH|̍ uttamE nAka# iha mAdayantAm|̍ | pRuthvI suvarcA# yuvatiH sajOśhA̱H| paurṇamAqsyudagAq-cCOBa̍mAnA|̍ AqpyAqyayantI̍ duritAni viśvA̱| uruM duhAqM ~MyajamAnAya̍ yajñam ( )| | 12 (10) 3. 1. 2 anuvAkaM 2 - yamanakśhatrAṇAM yAjyAnuvAkyAH

RuddhyAsma# havyair-namasOpa̍ sadya|̍ mitraM dEvaM mitradhEya̍nnO̍ astu| anUrAqdhAn. haviśhA# varddhayantaH|̍ śataM jIvEma̍ śaradaH savIrAH|̍ | citraM nakśhatra-muda̍gAt̍ purastA̱t| anUrAqdhAsa iti yad vadanti|̍ tanmitra Eti̍ pathiBi# rdEvayAnai̱H| hiraṇyayai rvitatai-rantari̍kśhE|̍ | indrO̱ jyEśhThAmanu nakśhatramEti|̍ yasmin̍ vRutraM ~MvRutra̍ tUryE# tatAra|̍ 13 (10)

tasmin̍ vayamamRutaM duhAnAH|̍ kśhudhaM̍ tarEma duritiM̍ duriśhTim|̍ | purandarAya# vRuśhaBAya# dhRuśhṇavE̱| aśhADhAya̍ sahamAnAya̍ mIDhuśhE̱| indrAya̍ jyEśhThA madhumad-duhA̍nA|̍ uruM kRuṇOtu̍ yajamAnAya̍ lOkam| | mUlaM̍ prajAM ~MvIravatIM̍ ~MvidEya| parA̱cyEtu niṛ RutiH̍ parAqcA| gOBi rnakśhatraM̍ paśuBiH samaktam|̍ aharBUyAqd-yaja̍mAnAya̍ mahya̱m| | 14 (10)

aharnO̍ adya suvitE̍ dadhAtu|̍ mUlaM nakśhatramiti̍ yad vadanti|̍ parAcIM̍ ~MvAqcA niṛ RutiM̍ nudAmi| śivaM prajAyai# śivamastu̍ mahya̱m| | yA divyA ApaH payasA̍ saM baBUvuH| yA antarikśha̍ uta pArthivIryAH|̍ yAsAmaśhAqDhA̍ anuyanti̍ kAma̱m| tA na ApaH śaṅ syOnA Bavantu|̍ | yAśca kUpyAq yAśca# nAqdyA̱H samudriyA̱H| yAśca# vaiśantIruta prAsacIryAH|̍ 15 (10)

yAsAmaśhAqDhA̍ madhu# Bakśhayanti|̍ tA na ApaH śaṅ syOnA Bavantu|̍ | tannO viśvE upa# śRuṇvantu dEvAH| tadaśhAqDhA̍ aBi sam~Myantu̍ yajñam| tannakśhatraM̍ prathatAM paśuByaH|̍ kRuśhir vRuśhTir yajamAnAya̍ kalpatAm| | śuBrAH kanyA# yuvatayaH̍ supEśasaH|̍ karmakRutaH̍ sukRutO# vIryAvatIH|̍ viśvA̱n dEvAn. haviśhA# varddhayantIH|̍ aśhAqDhAH kAmamupayAntu̍ yajñam| | 16 (10)

yasmin brahmAq&Byajayath̍ sarvamEtat|̍ amu~jca# lOka midamUca̍ sarva̱m| tannO nakśhatramaBijid̍ vijitya|̍ śriyaM̍ dadhAq-tvahRuṇIyamAnam|̍ | uBau lOkau brahmaṇAq̍ sa~jjitEmau|̍ tannO nakśhatramaBijid̍ vicaśhTAm|̍ tasmin̍ vayaM pRutanAqH̍ saM jayEma|̍ tannO# dEvAsO anujAnantu̍ kAma̱m| | śRuṇvanti# śrOṇA-mamRutasya̍ gOpAm| puṇyAmasyAq̍ upaśRuṇOmi̍ vAca̱m| 17 (10)

mahIM dEvIM ~MviśhṇupatnI-majUryAm|̍ pratIcImEnAṃ̍ haviśhA# yajAmaH| | trEdhA viśhṇu-rurugAqyO̍ vicakramE|̍ mahIM divaM̍ pRuthivI-mantarikśham|̍ tacCrOṇaiti śrava# icCamAnA|̍ puṇyaṅq ślOkaM ~MyajamAnAya̍ kRuṇvatI| | aśhTau dEvA vasavaH̍ sOmyAsaH|̍ catasrO̍ dEvI rajarAqH śraviśhThAH|̍ tE yajñaM pA̱ntu rajasaH̍ parastA̱t| sam~MvathsarIṇa-mamRutaṅ̍# svasti| | 18 (10)

yajñaM naH̍ pAntu vasavaH̍ purastA̱t| dakśhiṇatO-&Biya̍ntu̍ śraviśhThAH|̍ puṇyaM nakśhatramaBi̍ sam~MviśAma|̍ mA nO arAti-raGaśaṃqsA̍ gann|̍ | kśhatrasya rAjAq varuṇO&dhirAqjaH|̍ nakśhatrAṇAṃ̍ śataBiśhag̍ vasiśhThaH|̍ tau dEvEByaH̍ kRuṇutO dIrGamAyuH|̍ śataṃ sahasrA# BEśhajAni# dhattaH| | yajñannO rAjAq varuṇa̍ upayAtu|̍ tannO viśvE# aBi sam~Myantu̍ dEvAH| 19(10)

tannO nakśhatraṃ̍ śataBiśhag̍ juśhAqṇam| dIrGamAyuH pratirad̍ BEśhajAni|̍ | aja EkapAqduda̍gAt̍ purastA̱t| viśvA# BUtAni# pratimOdamAnaH|̍ tasya# dEvAH prasavaM̍ ~Myanti̍ sarvE̱| prOśhThapadAsO# amRutasya̍ gOpAH| | viBrAjamAnaH̍ samidhAqna ugraH| A&ntarikśha-maruhada-gandyAm|̍ taṃ sUryaM̍ dEva-majamEkapAdam|̍ prOśhThapadAsO anuyanti̍ sarvE̱| | 20 (10)

ahir̍ buddhniyaH prathamAna̍ Eti| śrEśhThO# dEvAnAmuta̍ mAnuśhAṇAm|̍ taM brA̱hmaṇAH sOmapAH̍ sOmyAsaH|̍ prOśhThapadAsO# aBi rakśhanti̍ sarvE̱| | catvAra EkamaBi̍ karma# dEvAH| prOśhThapadAsa iti yAn. vadanti|̍ tE buddhaniyaM̍ pariśhadyaṅ# stuvantaH|̍ ahiṃ# rakśhanti namasOpasadya̍|̍ | pUśhA rEvatyanvEti̍ panthA̱m| puśhTipatI# paśupA vAjabastyau|̍ 21 (10)

imAni# havyA prayatA̍ juśhAqṇA| sugairnO yAnairupayAtAM̍ ~Myajñam| | kśhudrAn paśUn rakśhatu̍ rEvatI# naH| gAvO# nO aśvAqṃq anvEtu̍ pUśhA| annaṃq rakśhantau̍ bahuqdhA virUpam|̍ vAjaṃ# sanutAqM ~MyajamAnAya̍ yajñam| | tadaśvinA-vaśvayujOpa̍yAtAm|̍ śuBaM gamiśhThau̍ suyamEBiraśvai̱H|̍ svaM nakśhatraṃ̍ haviśhAq yajantau|̍ maddhvAq saMpRuktau̍ yajuśhAq̍ samaktau|̍ | 22 (10)

yau dEvAnA̱M Biśhajau# havyavAqhau| viśvasya̍ dUtA-vamRutasya̍ gOpau| tau nakśhatraM̍ jujuśhAqṇO-payAtAm|̍ namO&śviByA̱M kRuṇumO-&śvayugByA̱m| | apa# pAqpmAnaM BaraṇIrBarantu|̍ tad yamO rAjAq BagavAqnq.̍ vicaśhTAm|̍ lOkasya rAjA# mahatO mahAn. hi| sugaM naH panthAqmaBayaM̍ kRuṇOtu| | yasmin nakśhatrE̍ yama Eti rAjA̱| yasmi-nnEnamaByaśhi̍caMnta̍ dEvAH ( )| tadasya̍ citraṃ haviśhA# yajAma| apa# pAqpmAnaM BaraṇIr̍ Barantu| | "nivEśanI̍ {1}" "yattE# dEvA adadhuH̍ {2}"| | 23 (13) (tatAra - mahyaM̍ - prAsacIryA - yA̱ntu yajñaM - ~MvAcaṅ# - svasti - dEvA-anu# yanti sarvE-vAjabastyau-sama̍ktau-dEvA̍ strIṇi# ca) (A2) 3. 1. 3 anuvAkaM 3 - cAndramasAdInAM saptanAmiśhTInAM yAjyAnuvAkyAH

"navO# navO Bavati jAyamAnO̍ {3]" "yamAdityA̍ aṃqśumA̱pyAqyayanti̍ {4}"| | yE virUpE̍ samanasA̍ sam~MvyayantI|̍ samAqnaM tantuM̍ pari tAtanAtE̱| viBU praBU anuBU̍ viśvatO# huvE| tE nO nakśhatrE̍ havamAgamEtam|̍ | vayaM dEvI brahmaṇA̍ sam~MvidAqnAH| suratnAsO̍ dEvavItiM̍ dadhAnAH|̍ ahOrAqtrE haviśhA# varddhayantaH|̍ ati# pAqpmAna-matimuktyA̍ gamEma| | pratyuvadRuśyAyatI|̍ 24 (10)

vyucCantI# duhitA divaH| apO mahI vRuṇutE̍ cakśhuśhA|̍ | tamO jyOtiśhkRuṇOti̍ sUnarI̱| udustriyA̱H sacatE sUryaH|̍ sa cA# udyannakśhatra-marcimat|̍ tavEduśhO̍ vyuśhi sUryasya̍ ca| | saM BaktEna# gamEmahi| tannO nakśhatra-marcimat|̍ BAqnumattEja# uccarat|̍ upa# yajña-mihAgamat|̍ | 25 (10)

pra nakśhatrAya̍ dEvAya|̍ indrAqyEnduṃ# havAmahE| sa naH̍ savitA suvath̍ sanim| puśhTidAM ~MvIravattamam|̍ | "udutyaM {5}" "citram {6}"| | "aditirna̍ uruśhyatu {7}" "mahImUśhu mAqtara̱m {8}| | "idaM ~MviśhṇuH{9}" "pratadviśhṇuH̍ {10]"| | "agnirmUrddhA {11}" "BuvaH̍ {12}"| | "anu# nO&dyAnumati̍ {13}" "ranvidanumatE̍ tvam {14}"| | "havyavAhaṅq {15}" "sviśhTam̍ {16}" ( )| | 26 (10) 3. 1. 4 anuvAkaM 4 - dEva nakśhatrEśhTibrAhmaṇam

agnirvA akAmayata|̍ annAqdO dEvAnAṅ# syAqmiti|̍ sa EtamagnayE kRuttikAByaH̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ niravapat|̍ tatO vai sO̱&nnAqdO dEvAnAmaBavat|̍ agnirvai dEvAnAmannAqdaH|̍ | yathA# ha vA agnir dEvanA-mannAqdaH|̍ Evaṃ ha vA Eśha manuśhyA̍ṇAM̍ Bavati| ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ | sO&tra# juhOti| agnayE svAhAq kRuttikAByaH̍ svAhA̱| ambAyai svAhA# dulAyai svAhA̱| nitatnyai svAhAq &Brayantyai̍ svAhA̱| mEGayantyai̍ svAhA# vara. śhayantyai̍ svAhA̱| cupuṇIkAyai̍ svAhEti|̍ | 27 (15)

prajApatiH̍ prajA asRujata|̍ tA asmAth̍ sRuśhTAH parAcIrAyann|̍ tAsAṃ# rOhiṇI-maByaddhyAyat|̍ sO&kAmayata|̍ upa mA&&vartEta|̍ samEnayA̍ gacCEyEti|̍ sa EtaM prajApatayE̍ rOhiṇyai caruM niravapat|̍ tatO vai sA tamupAvartata|̍ samEnayA̍ &gacCata| | upa# ha vA EnaM̍ priyamAvartatE|̍ saM priyEṇa# gacCatE| ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ | sO&tra# juhOti| prajApatayE̍ svAhA# rOhiṇyai svAhA̱| rOcamAnAyai̍ svAhA̱ prajAByaH svAhEti|̍ | 28 (16)

sOmO vA akAmayata|̍ OśhadhInAṃ̍ rAqjya-maBijayEyamiti̍|̍ sa Etaṃ sOmAya̍ mRugaśIra. śhAya# śyAmAqkaM caruM payasi̍ niravapat|̍ tatO vai sa OśhadhInAṃ̍ rAqjyamaByajayat|̍ samAqnAnAṃ# ha vai rAqjyamaBijayati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| sOmAya̍ svAhA# mRugaśIra. śhAya svAhA̱| invakAByaH svAhauśhadhIByaH̍ svAhA̱| rAqjyAya svAhAq &Bijityai̍ svAhEti|̍ | 29 (11)

rudrO vA akAmayata|̍ paśumAnth syAqmiti|̍ sa Etaṃ rudrAyAqrdrAyai praiya~ggavaM̍ caruM payasi̍ niravapat|̍ tatO vai sa paśumAna̍Bavat|̍ paśumAn. ha vai Bavati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| rudrAya svAhAq &&rdrAyai svAhA̱| pinvamAnAyai̍ svAhA# paśuByaH svAhEti|̍ | 30 (10)

RukśhA vA iyamalOmakA̍&&sIt|̍ sA&kAmayata|̍ OśhadhIBir-vanaspati̍BiH̍ prajAyEyEti̍|̍ saitamadityai̍ punarvasuByAM̍ caruM niravapat|̍ tatO vA iyamOśhadhIBir-vanaspati̍BiH̍ prAjAyata|̍ prajAyatE̍ ha vai prajayA# paśuBiH|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| adityai̍ svAhAq punarvasuByAm|̍ svAhA&&BU̱tyai svAhAq prajA̱tyai svAhEti|̍ | 31 (11)

bRuhaspatirvA akAmayata|̍ brahmavarcasI syAqmiti|̍ sa EtaM bRuhaspatayE̍ tiśhyAya̍ naivAqraM caruM payasi̍ niravapat|̍ tatO vai sa brahmavarcasya̍Bavat|̍ brahmavarcasI ha vai Bavati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| bRuhaspatayE̍ svAhA# tiśhyAya̍ svAhA̱| brahmavarcasAya svAhEti|̍ | 32 (10)

dEvAqsurAH sam~MyattA̍ Asann| tE dEvAH sarpEBya# AśrEśhABya AjyE# karamBaM niravapann|̍ tAnEtABirEva̍ dEvatA-BirupA̍nayann|̍ EtABirha̍ vai dEvatABir-dviśhantaM̍ BrAtRuvya-mupa̍nayati|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| sarpEByaH svAhA̱&&śrEśhAByaH svAhA̱| dandaśUkE̱ByaH svAhEti|̍ | 33 (9)

pitarO vA akAmayanta|̍ pitRulOka RuddhnuyAqmEti̍|̍ ta EtaM pitRuByO# maGAByaH̍ purODAśaṃq śhaTkapAlaM̍ niravapann|̍ tatO vai tE pitRulOka̍ A̱rddhnuvann| pitRulOkE ha vA RudhnOti|̍ ya EtEna# haviśhAq yajatE|̍ ya u# cainadEvaM ~MvEda|̍ sO&tra# juhOti| pitRuByaH svAhA# maGAByaH|̍ svAhA# &naGAByaH svAhA# &gadAByaH|̍ svAhA# &rundhatIByaH svAhEti|̍ | 34 (11)
